abstract: United Technologies, parent of jet engine maker Pratt & Whitney, aerospace manufacturer Hamilton Sundstrand and other businesses, said it expected to spend roughly $3 billion on mergers and acquisitions next year and $1.5 billion to buy back company stock.
snippet: United Technologies, parent of jet engine maker Pratt & Whitney, aerospace manufacturer Hamilton Sundstrand and other businesses, said it expected to spend roughly $3 billion on mergers and acquisitions next year and $1.5 billion to buy back compa...
lead_paragraph: United Technologies isn’t wasting any time putting its upcoming shopping spree into play.

headline.main: United Tech to Spend $3 Billion on M&A in 2010
